msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.

Initial pass at getting the column header bar mouse event handlers framework set up for both header and separator events.  The header events use the grid events and there is a new set of events for the separators (in GridEvent for now).  In Grid, added resizeableColumns.  For a column to resize, this must be true and the individual column must be resizeable.  Added getColumnIndexAt() to GridLayout.  Added columnResizeIndicator to the CHB skin.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.

Implemented most of the requireSelection functionality.  The interactive and programmatic pieces should work if the dataProvider and columns collections remains constant.  A few of the collectionChange handlers, marked with FIXMEs, notably remove, still need to have this functionality added.

Also fixed preserveSelection for rows so the selection will be preserved across refreshes.  Cells are still not preserved across refreshes because that requires much more work and perhaps some changes to the cell selection data structures - marked with a FIXME.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.
More work on ColumnHeaderBar.  It is no longer commented out in the DataGridSkin but if you have problems you can comment it out again.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Revert part of 16547 that moved stuff into EventUtils.  Apparently UIComponent can't be in there.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid and Tree only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.

Move Han's implementation of Press-Drag-Release Mouse Gesture Handling from Grid to EventUtil.  The mini-spec is http://zerowing.corp.adobe.com/display/flex/Conventional+Press-Drag-Release+Mouse+Gesture+Handling.  This will be used by the ColumnHeaderBar as well.
